languages.text: "Ох, постойте... Сейчас... ваш ход или мой?" {n}Джай тыкает пальцем в очередную фигуру, и амасек растекается по доске.{/n} "Пожалуй, отдам победу вам, шерин. Еще стопка, и я свалюсь в купальню... Вам же не нужен труп в бассейне? Во-о-от. О чем это я? Ах да, мне... нужно проветриться".

"Hold on. Wait a minute... Is it... your turn? Or mine?" {n}Jae reaches for a "piece" and knocks it over, spilling the amasec all over the board.{/n} "Tell you what, you can have this one, shereen. If I have another drink, I think I'll fall right into this bathtub... And you don't want a corpse in your pool, do you? Anyway... What was I talking about? Oh, right. I think... I need to get some air."
languages.original_text: "Ох, постойте... Сейчас... ваш ход или мой?" {n}Джай тыкает пальцем в очередную фигуру, и амасек растекается по доске.{/n} "Пожалуй, отдам победу вам, шерин. Еще стопка, и я свалюсь в купальню... Вам же не нужен труп в бассейне? Во-о-от. О чем это я? Ах да, мне... нужно проветриться".

traits.locale_text: "Whoa, wait a minute... Is it... your go now? Or is it mine?" {n}Jae pokes a piece, knocking it over and spilling the amasec all over the board.{/n} "Tell you what, you can have this one, shereen. If I have one more, I think I'll fall right into this bathtub... And you don't need a corpse floating in your pool, now, do you? Well, theeere you go. Where was I? Right, I think... I need to get some air."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

If I have another drink, I think I'll fall right into this bathtub... And you don't want a corpse in your pool, do you? Anyway... What was I talking about? Oh, right. I think... I need to get some air."

languages.text: « Attendez. Une petite minute... C'est... à vous de jouer ? Ou à moi ? » {n}Jae tend la main pour prendre l'un des verres d'amasec qui vous servent de pièces, mais elle le renverse sur le plateau.{/n} « Bon, je déclare forfait, shereen. Si je bois une gorgée de plus, je risque de tomber dans l'eau... et vous ne voudriez pas d'un cadavre dans votre baignoire, n'est-ce pas ? Bref... de quoi est-ce que je parlais, déjà ? Ah oui. Je crois que... j'ai besoin de prendre l'air. »
languages.original_text: "Hold on. Wait a minute... Is it... your turn? Or mine?" {n}Jae reaches for a "piece" and knocks it over, spilling the amasec all over the board.{/n} "Tell you what, you can have this one, shereen. If I have another drink, I think I'll fall right into this bathtub... And you don't want a corpse in your pool, do you? Anyway... What was I talking about? Oh, right. I think... I need to get some air."

traits.locale_text: « Attendez. Une petite minute... C'est... à vous de jouer ? Ou à moi ? » {n}Jae tend la main pour prendre l'un des verres d'amasec qui vous servent de pièces, mais elle le renverse sur le plateau.{/n} « Bon, je déclare forfait, shereen. Si je bois une gorgée de plus, je risque de tomber dans l'eau... et vous ne voudriez pas d'un cadavre dans votre baignoire, n'est-ce pas ? Bref... de quoi est-ce que je parlais, déjà ? Ah oui. Je crois que... j'ai besoin de prendre l'air. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Espere. Un momento... ¿Es... su turno? ¿O el mío?». {n}Jae alarga la mano para coger una "pieza" y la derriba, tirando amasec por todo el tablero.{/n} «¿Sabe qué? La victoria es suya, shereen. Como beba otro trago, voy a caerme a la bañera... y no querrá un cadáver en su piscina, ¿verdad? En fin... ¿qué estaba diciendo? Ah, sí. Creo... creo que necesito tomar el aire».
languages.original_text: "Hold on. Wait a minute... Is it... your turn? Or mine?" {n}Jae reaches for a "piece" and knocks it over, spilling the amasec all over the board.{/n} "Tell you what, you can have this one, shereen. If I have another drink, I think I'll fall right into this bathtub... And you don't want a corpse in your pool, do you? Anyway... What was I talking about? Oh, right. I think... I need to get some air."

traits.locale_text: «Espere. Un momento... ¿Es... su turno? ¿O el mío?». {n}Jae alarga la mano para coger una "pieza" y la derriba, tirando amasec por todo el tablero.{/n} «¿Sabe qué? La victoria es suya, shereen. Como beba otro trago, voy a caerme a la bañera... y no querrá un cadáver en su piscina, ¿verdad? En fin... ¿qué estaba diciendo? Ah, sí. Creo... creo que necesito tomar el aire».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “等等，等我一下……现在是……轮到你了……还是我？”{n}婕伊伸手去拿你的棋子，但却打翻了酒杯，艾玛赛克酒洒了一地。{/n}“说真的，这局你赢了，亲爱的。要是我再喝的话，恐怕就要醉死在浴缸里了……你可不希望浴缸里有具尸体，是吧？总之……我刚刚说什么来着？噢，对了，我觉得……我得出去透透气才行。”
languages.original_text: "Hold on. Wait a minute... Is it... your turn? Or mine?" {n}Jae reaches for a "piece" and knocks it over, spilling the amasec all over the board.{/n} "Tell you what, you can have this one, shereen. If I have another drink, I think I'll fall right into this bathtub... And you don't want a corpse in your pool, do you? Anyway... What was I talking about? Oh, right. I think... I need to get some air."

traits.locale_text: “等等，等我一下……现在是……轮到你了……还是我？”{n}婕伊伸手去拿你的棋子，但却打翻了酒杯，艾玛赛克酒洒了一地。{/n}“说真的，这局你赢了，亲爱的。要是我再喝的话，恐怕就要醉死在浴缸里了……你可不希望浴缸里有具尸体，是吧？总之……我刚刚说什么来着？噢，对了，我觉得……我得出去透透气才行。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「待て。ちょっと待ってくれ…これは…あなたの番？それとも私の？」{n}ジェイは駒を取って倒し、アマセックをボード全体にこぼした。{/n}「シェリーン、これをあげるよ。もう一杯飲んだら、私は浴槽の中に倒れそうだ…プールの中に死体はいらないだろう？とにかく…何の話だっけ？あぁ、そうか。私は…空気を吸いに行くよ」
languages.original_text: "Hold on. Wait a minute... Is it... your turn? Or mine?" {n}Jae reaches for a "piece" and knocks it over, spilling the amasec all over the board.{/n} "Tell you what, you can have this one, shereen. If I have another drink, I think I'll fall right into this bathtub... And you don't want a corpse in your pool, do you? Anyway... What was I talking about? Oh, right. I think... I need to get some air."

traits.locale_text: 「待て。ちょっと待ってくれ…これは…あなたの番？それとも私の？」{n}ジェイは駒を取って倒し、アマセックをボード全体にこぼした。{/n}「シャリーン、これをあげるよ。もう一杯飲んだら、私は浴槽の中に倒れそうだ…プールの中に死体はいらないだろう？とにかく…何の話だっけ？あぁ、そうか。私は…空気を吸いに行くよ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Augenblick. Moment mal ... Seid ... Ihr am Zug? Oder ich?" {n}Jae greift nach einer "Figur" und wirft sie um. Amasec fließt über das gesamte Spielbrett.{/n} "Wisst Ihr was, Ihr habt gewonnen, Shereen. Wenn ich noch einen Schluck trinke, falle ich geradewegs in die Badewanne ... Und Ihr wollt doch keine Leiche in Eurem Becken haben, oder? Wie dem auch sei ... Wovon habe ich gerade geredet? Ach ja. Ich glaube ... Ich brauche mal frische Luft."
languages.original_text: "Hold on. Wait a minute... Is it... your turn? Or mine?" {n}Jae reaches for a "piece" and knocks it over, spilling the amasec all over the board.{/n} "Tell you what, you can have this one, shereen. If I have another drink, I think I'll fall right into this bathtub... And you don't want a corpse in your pool, do you? Anyway... What was I talking about? Oh, right. I think... I need to get some air."

traits.locale_text: "Augenblick. Moment mal ... Seid ... Ihr am Zug? Oder ich?" {n}Jae greift nach einer "Figur" und wirft sie um. Amasec fließt über das gesamte Spielbrett.{/n} "Wisst Ihr was, Ihr habt gewonnen, Shereen. Wenn ich noch einen Schluck trinke, falle ich geradewegs in die Badewanne ... Und Ihr wollt doch keine Leiche in Eurem Becken haben, oder? Wie dem auch sei ... Wovon habe ich gerade geredet? Ach ja. Ich glaube ... Ich brauche mal frische Luft."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Dur. Bir dakika... Sıra sende mi?.. Yoksa bende mi?" {n}Jae bir "taşa" uzanıyor, onu devirip amaseki tahtaya döküyor.{/n} "Biliyor musun... Bu maç senin olsun şirinim. Ben bir şey daha içersem doğrudan küvete düşeceğim gibi geliyor. Havuzunda bir ceset olsun istemezsin herhâlde, değil mi? Neyse... Neyden bahsediyordum ben? Tamam. Sanırım... Biraz hava almam gerek."
languages.original_text: "Hold on. Wait a minute... Is it... your turn? Or mine?" {n}Jae reaches for a "piece" and knocks it over, spilling the amasec all over the board.{/n} "Tell you what, you can have this one, shereen. If I have another drink, I think I'll fall right into this bathtub... And you don't want a corpse in your pool, do you? Anyway... What was I talking about? Oh, right. I think... I need to get some air."
